'''Rainbow Macarons''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Rainbow Macarons is obtainable from [[Sanguinetti]] at [[Hotel Debord]] for {{Item|Mora|x=5,000}}.

Depending on the quality, Rainbow Macarons decreases climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by '''15%'''/'''20%'''/'''25%'''  for 900s. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Navia|"Pick What You Like!"}}
